Release Notes
Filter Design Toolbox 3.0 Release Notes New Features Dfilt Objects for Quantized and Fixed-Point Filters New Quantization Panel in FDATool New Multirate Filter Design Panel in FDATool Added Filter Design Object for Designing Filters New Methods for Fixed-Point Filters New FIR Filter Design Function fircband New SOS Scaling and SOS Section Reordering Capability in FDATool New SOS View capability in FDATool and FVTool
Major Bug Fixes Improved ifir FIR filter design firgr (formerly gremez) Improved Convergence Corrected firnyquist Decay Option
Upgrading from an Earlier Release Fixed-Point Filters Require Fixed-Point Toolbox Qfilt Objects and Functions Obsolete No FDATool Option To Turn Quantization On or Off Optimization/Scaling Dialog Removed from FDATool Quantizer Objects Moved to the Fixed-Point Toolbox QFFT Objects and Functions Removed from the Toolbox Unit Quantizer Objects and Functions Removed from the Toolbox No dfilt limitcycle in the Toolbox Function coewrite Applies to dfilt.dffir Filter Objects cicdecimate And cicinterpolate Now Obsolete Function gremez Renamed firgr Multirate Filters Remove Trailing Zero-Valued Coefficients
Known Software and Documentation Problems Filter Design and Analysis Tool Documentation Still Shows the Deleted Objects Qfft, Qfilt, Quantizer Documentation Shows Instances of the Filter Property InheritSettings Certain FDATool Panes Do Not Have "What's This" Help
Filter Design Toolbox 2.5 Release Notes New Features New Object-Based Adaptive Filters New Object-Based Multirate Filters Updated and New Methods for Adaptive Filter and Multirate Filter Objects New Demos for Adaptive Filters and Multirate Filters Import XILINX Coefficient (.COE) Files with FDATool
Major Bug Fixes Upgrading from an Earlier Release Previous Adaptive Filter Functions Now Obsolete Uninstall Previous Versions Before Installing Version 2.5 Changed Calattice and Calatticepc Dfilt Objects for Version 2.5
